backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining game state, dialogue nodes, activities, moments, and APIs for starting and continuing a game.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented admin-gating features to related files, components, and requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend source files used for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind root theme variables and global styles defining color tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the app root and main TypeScript entry module.
frontend/OPS_CANISTER_AVAILABILITY.md: Operational guide explaining canister uptime limits and steps to keep the backend running.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app orchestrating screen navigation, startup sequence, backend checks, and game launch flow.
frontend/src/config/adminGate.ts: Config file defining the admin username and localStorage key for admin-gate state.
Defines activity metadata including trust effects and optional moment unlocks.
frontend/src/game/audio/useAudio.ts: Manages audio settings and background music playback with persistent volume and mute state.
frontend/src/game/characters/Puro.tsx: Renders the 3D Puro character with idle animation and click-to-start-dialogue interaction.
frontend/src/game/controls/MobileControl: Implements touch joystick and look controls for mobile devices with touch event handling.
frontend/src/game/controls/usePlayerCont: Combines keyboard, terminal, and joystick input to produce normalized movement and look vectors.
frontend/src/game/customization/customiz: Provides available customization items and their possible placement locations.
Defines dialogue tree nodes with branching choices and trust effects.
frontend/src/game/GameView.tsx: Main game container that initializes state, renders the 3D scene, and conditionally displays UI panels and pause logic.
frontend/src/game/letters/letterTemplate: Generates contextual letter responses based on keyword detection in the player's message.
frontend/src/game/minigames/BookSortingM: A drag-and-drop style minigame where players sort books into categories and gain or lose trust based on accuracy.
frontend/src/game/minigames/DrawingMiniG: A slideshow-style minigame letting players view Puro's drawings, increasing trust as each drawing is viewed.
frontend/src/game/minigames/HideAndSeekM: A timed guessing minigame where players try to find Puro's hiding spot, affecting trust based on speed and accuracy.
frontend/src/game/minigames/MiniGameLaun: A launcher UI that opens and closes different minigames and returns to a selection menu when one finishes.
frontend/src/game/moments/MomentPlayer.t: Displays a selected story moment with title and scene text and allows closing the viewer.
frontend/src/game/moments/momentsData.ts: Defines moment data entries with IDs, descriptions, scenes, and trust requirements.
frontend/src/game/scene/LibraryScene.tsx: Three.js scene defining the library environment, player movement, lighting, props, and interactions for the game world.
frontend/src/game/state/useGameStore.ts: Defines a persistent Zustand store managing game state, UI visibility, trust levels, progression, and related update actions.
frontend/src/game/story/endings.ts: Contains ending definitions with trust thresholds and a helper to select the correct ending by trust level.
frontend/src/game/story/EndingScene.tsx: Renders the final ending scene based on trust level and provides options to restart the game or return to the title.
frontend/src/game/ui/ActivityMenu.tsx: Shows available activities, updates trust and progression on selection, and closes after an activity is chosen.
Displays discovered and placed customization items and allows placing new items in the library.
frontend/src/game/ui/DialoguePanel.tsx: Handles dialogue flow, updating trust and moving between dialogue nodes based on player choices.
frontend/src/game/ui/LettersPanel.tsx: Allows writing letters and viewing responses, storing them in game state with delayed automated replies.
frontend/src/game/ui/MomentsMenu.tsx: Displays a list of moments, showing locked or unlocked status, and plays a selected moment via MomentPlayer.
frontend/src/game/ui/PauseMenu.tsx: Pause overlay offering resume, quick-access menus, settings, reset, and optional admin terminal.
frontend/src/game/ui/SettingsScreen.tsx: Settings panel allowing audio mute and volume control with a back button.
frontend/src/game/ui/TrustMeter.tsx: Shows current trust level with color-coded label and progress bar.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendAvailabilit: Checks backend health using the actor and exposes status, timestamps, and refetching utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, managing login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend game operations such as fetching state, starting games, making choices, and updating progress.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with a warm color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/startup.ts: Handles one‑time startup initialization, including asset preloading and storage checks, with reset support.
frontend/src/state/useAdminGateStore.ts: Zustand store providing a persisted local‑only username gate to unlock or lock admin mode.
Zustand store for toggling and persisting a boolean flag controlling server access.
frontend/src/ui/AdminAccessPanel.tsx: UI panel for entering a username to unlock admin mode, showing status and allowing relocking.
frontend/src/ui/CreditsScreen.tsx: Credits screen showing game info, feature list, and a link attribution, with a button to return.
frontend/src/ui/DiagnosticTerminalOverla: Admin‑gated diagnostic terminal overlay supporting command input, output scrolling, and hotkeys.
frontend/src/ui/GameLaunchErrorScreen.ts: Displays user‑friendly and detailed error info when game launch fails, with retry and back actions.
frontend/src/ui/GameRuntimeErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches game runtime errors, shows a user message, and optionally displays stack details with a back-to-title button.
frontend/src/ui/ServerStatusIndicator.ts: Displays server availability status with an icon and color based on backend health and local server-access toggle.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/commands.ts: Implements terminal command handling for diagnostics and local server-access toggling with output routing.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/useTerminalDiag: Formats diagnostic state into readable text lines for the in‑app terminal.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/useTerminalStor: Zustand store managing terminal visibility and logging of input/output lines.
frontend/src/ui/TitleScreen.tsx: Main title screen UI providing game start actions, admin panel access, server-access controls, and server status display.
frontend/src/utils/launchErrorNormalizat: Normalizes raw launch errors into categorized, user-friendly messages for game start and continue actions.
frontend/STARTUP.md: Documentation describing the frontend startup flow, runStartup behavior, and how to extend initialization logic.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current design, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented features for a 3D library-based adventure/visual-novel hybrid. Includes backend IC canister requirements, startup constraints, and multiple unresolved scope conflicts.
